name: austin
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital city of the US state of Texas: Whole Foods has eliminated plastic bags in its Austin stores. He and Melanie met on a blind date at the University of Texas at Austin.
More examplesFewer examplesShe grew up in Austin.He spent five years working as a nurse in Austin.Gay rights supporters cheered, chanted, and waved rainbow colors in Austin and in cities across the country protesting the vote.I'm in Austin, TX and looking for a plastic surgeon who specializes in rhinoplasty.
